intro: Chamaecrista commixta, commonly known as the yellow crownbeard, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of the Americas. It is characterized by its compound leaves and bright yellow flowers that bloom in clusters. The plant belongs to the Fabaceae family, also known as the legume or bean family. It is often found in open habitats such as grasslands and disturbed soils. Chamaecrista commixta is valued for its ornamental appeal and has been used in traditional medicine in some regions.
